video.title: Goddess of Marriage
video.synopsis: Ideals and reality clash when four women in different stages of love and marriage deal with relationship issues like fidelity and family expectations.

episodes.synopsis: Sparks fly when chance brings Hyun Woo and Ji Hye together, but she is already engaged to Tae Wook; Hye Jung feels trapped in a miserable marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Tae Wook confronts Ji Hye about her reluctance to wed him; Hyun Woo breaks his promise; Sung Soo has an affair with Cynthia; Ji Sun is overwhelmed.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye proceeds toward marrying Tae Wook; Hyun Woo tries to reach Ji Hye; Tae Jin sets his sights on politics; Sung Soo grows disgusted with his wife.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Fate brings Ji Hye and Hyun Woo back together, but Ji Hye feels duty-bound to Tae Wook; Hye Jung talks about her husband on air to help his campaign.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye decides to end things with Hyun Woo; Tae Jin exploits his wife and children in a TV interview to advance his political career.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When Eun Hee sees Seung Soo and Cynthia entering a hotel room, the emotional upset lands her in the hospital; Hyun Woo learns that Ji Hye is engaged.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye visits her father's farm to clear her mind; Ji Sun's career falls apart when her son performs karaoke; Sung Soo's wife remains unconscious.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye leaves her father and Hyun Woo at the farm; Tae Wook learns of Hyun Woo; Sung Soo seeks a divorce; Hye Jung is appointed to a prestigious post.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Tae Wook pressures Ji Hye after they run into Hyun Woo; new executive Hye Jung lays down the law; Eun Hee seeks evidence of her husband’s affair.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye wants to call off the wedding; Sung Soo leaves his family for Cynthia; Ji Sun may get the promotion she wants; Hye Jung faces family problems.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye and Tae Wook marry; Ji Sun's family ruins her celebration; Hye Jung incites controversy at the hotel; Tae Jin fires up his political campaign.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye moves into a separate building but still cannot escape the constant criticism and bad advice coming from her prickly, unsupportive family.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Hye Jung’s daughter has a new teacher who seduces Tae Jin; Tae Jin keeps mistreating Hye Jung; Eun Hee wants to sell her house and expel her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Jung Sook tries to force Ji Hye to quit her job, despite Tae Wook's promise; when Nam tests her limits, Hye Jung takes matters into her own hands.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: When Jung Sook scolds Ji Hye and enlists Hye Jung's support, Hye Jung gives Ji Hye unwelcome advice; Man Ho discovers Tae Jin's unscrupulous ways.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: When Cynthia dumps Seung Soo, he learns that Eun Hee sold the house, leaving him homeless; Ji Hye's dreams crumble; Sae Gyung waits for Hyun Woo.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: A despairing Ji Hye quits her job and returns home; Seung Soo gets fired from his job for his misdeeds, and Cynthia puts an end to their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: New occupants live the house Eun Hee sold; Seung Soo makes a vow to his son; Jin Hee hires Eun Hee and lets her move in; Ji Hye is enslaved at home.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Hye Jung excels at work, but news from her mother puts a damper on her joy; Ji Hye runs into Hyun Woo and pretends to be happy about her current life.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye says good-bye to Hyun Woo before she and Tae Wook leave for America; Hyun Woo’s engagement hits a snag; someone is blackmailing Hye Jung.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: A blackmailer's identity is revealed; Ji Hye drinks away her sorrows; Tae Jin refuses to testify; Eun Hee succeeds as Sung Soo falters.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Hye Jung’s old photos cause an uproar; Ji Hye writes radio scripts in secret, but one listener knows; a crooked deal turns Hye Jin into a scapegoat.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye takes in the pregnant Yeon Soo; Sae Gyeong and Hyun Woo make plans as their mothers clash; Sung Soo takes a lowly job; Ji Hye takes a stand.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye leaves home; Hye Jung visits Sang Hoon after hearing of his accident; Min Jung makes an announcement; Hye Jung shares her plans for divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Se Gyung is upset when she finds a picture of Hyun Woo with Ji Hye; Hyun Woo worries about Ji Hye when he hears changes in her radio program.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Chaos rules when Hye Jung leaves the house with the kids; Hye Jung finds grounds for divorce in public records and seeks sky-high alimony payments.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Tae Wook is frustrated when he confronts Hyun Woo about his message to Ji Hye; Man Ho tries to stop Hye Jung from going forward with her lawsuit.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Tae Woo tries to bring Ji Hye home to put a lid on family scandal; Min Jung’s grandparents come uninvited to a pre-wedding family meeting.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Ji Sun reconsiders bringing her in-laws home; Nam Gil tries to persuade Ji Hye to stay married; Eun Hee's absence from her classes worries Seung Soo.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Man Ho tries to persuade Hye Jung to come home and makes promises; Nam Gil begs Ji Hye to change her mind and return to Tae Wook and his family.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Hye Jung returns to life in the Shinyoung group family and becomes vice president; Tae Jin's fury flares when he learns of Hye Jung's promotion.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Tae Wook visits Hyun Woo to apologize for his brother's misdeeds; when Mi Ra turns herself in, a fearful Hye Jung tries to get Tae Jin to return home.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: When Ji Hye is hospitalized, the press sees it as a major scoop; Sung Soo is jailed for trespassing; Hyun Woo tells Se Kyung to stop visiting him.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Tae Wook realizes how Ji Hye has suffered; bad blood boils between the mothers of Se Kyung and Hyun Woo; Gyung Min is arrested, and others may follow.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Ji Hye’s and Tae Wook divorce; Hye Jung takes the high road through tough times; Eun Hee and her husband sign a pact; Hyun Woo releases Se Kyung.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Jang Soo supports his wife's dream; Ji Hye writes a book and meets the new Tae Wook; Ji Hye and Hyun Woo find their paths crossing once again.
episodes.title: Episode 36
